programme.title: Blood & Treasure
programme.desc: The FBI offers Danny and Lexi information that will help them in their search for Cleopatra, but only if Danny is able to get his incarcerated father, Patrick (Mark Valley), to give up the location of paintings that he helped steal 20 years earlier. Also, Farouk deals with a loose end and takes a big step forward in his master plan.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent - The Champions
programme.desc: A British talent competition series, featuring a variety of winners, finalists, and other successful or notable participants from past seasons.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S38

programme.title: The Wonderful World Of Baby Animals
programme.desc: Take an inside look at the most important and experimental months of newborn animals' lives. Experience the trials, tribulations and triumphs. See what they get up to when no-one's watching. And find out what drives their joyous - and sometimes strange - behaviour.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Food Chase
programme.desc: The cast from Lion Mums 4 are in Jurong for Food Chase. Lina Ng, Roxanne Zhang, Caryn Cheng, and Regina Lim may have started on good terms but will their relationships sour as the competition heats up? After all, only one team can avoid The Drink!

programme.title: Teddies
programme.desc: Meeks has a secret talent - he can sing really well! However, he believes that he can only sing when he has his special furbrush. His friends eventually help him realise that he can sing on his own. Dom decides to become a magician, but his tricks aren't working very well. When his friends decide to secretly help him, Dom thinks that he's doing the tricks for real.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2
programme.desc: Sneeze doesn't take proper care of his indoor plant - and now it's droopy. He tries to revive it with his own bizarre blend of plant food, but something very strange starts to happen...

programme.title: Tumble Leaf S4
programme.desc: Tumble Leaf is set in a whimsical land where a small blue fox named Fig plays each day and discovers adventure, friendship and love around every bend in the path.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2
programme.desc: Travelling the world with their teacher, mentor and friend Ubercorn, a disco-grooving unicorn, the Go Jetters are fixing the mishaps caused by the mischievous meddlings of Grandmaster Glitch in new locations including Central Park in New York, Machu Picchu, China, Japan, Mali, and Petra in Jordan. And now we get to know our plucky international heroes, Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz even better, as Series 2 takes us to the top-secret island home of the Go Jet Academy to see them intraining.

programme.title: Pororo the Little Penguin S7
programme.desc: Pororo is a Little Penguin with big dreams! He lives on a tiny island with his friends Eddy the Fox, Loopy the Beaver, Poby the Polar Bear, and Crong the Dinosaur to name a few and they planned for the best fun ever in this new season.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S1
programme.desc: Aamil wants to help Lux upgrade his peaceful oasis as he feels it is only a 4 out of 10 presently. With the Number Squad's help, Aamil finds the best ways to improve its score to a perfect 10.Shelly and Captain Redbeard found the Golden Conch at the same time and are squabbling over who gets to keep it. The squad suggests settling the score with a little competition.

programme.title: Super Wings S5: Super Pets
programme.desc: Jett and Jett Pet are called to Dunedin, New Zealand, to help a boy and his new friend collect a trailer's worth of furniture that's rolled down the world's steepest street! Paul arrives to help with the clean up and a fun rap about bike safety.

programme.title: The Deep S4
programme.desc: Devil Daniels is copying all Ant's ideas. He even has his own pet fish-Bethany! The Nektons are busy recovering sunken shipping containers, so when Bethany finds herself in danger, only Jeffrey can save her!

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: While Axel dreams of being bigger so people take him seriously, Madcap designs a giant body for himself that gives him immeasurable strength. The Power Players seem resourceless in the face of such a huge threat...

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Winston becames ashamed when a picture of his first pubic hair is leaked throughout the school. Mike and Hiro try to help Winston, as Celeste goes on a journey of self-reflection with the mysterious Librarian.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Things go awry when a wave of shame overwhelms Springwood, bringing out inner monsters left, right, and centre! Mike and Hiro must try their best to destroy the monster without Celeste's help. Will the trio reunite in this time of grave danger?

programme.title: Marblegen
programme.desc: In a world where marble play has become one of the most popular sports, Marblegens tournaments, magical marbles with extraordinary powers, are all the rage. Forming the Meteor team, Assa, Cosmo, Luna and Sam decided to participate in the Olympia MARBLEGAMES, one of the biggest tournaments on the planet! Their objective: to prevent the terrible Marcellus King from seizing the powerful Mercury ball, a reward offered to the winners.

programme.title: OddBods S3
programme.desc: The OddBods return for a new season of fun and laughter!

programme.title: Ok-to Try
programme.desc: Are you eating a... pencil?! In this episode, kids try their hands at making fondant from marshmallows to create edible stationaries, sculptures and more!

programme.title: 44 Cats - First Series
programme.desc: Granny Pina is decorating the Christmas tree while the Buffycats are playing. Suddenly, Santa's helper cat Glitter crash lands in the garden! The Buffycats will have to help him find all the gifts he lost and save Christmas for all cats!

programme.title: The LEGO Movie
programme.desc: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as special, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

programme.title: Crimewatch
programme.desc: Following an assault from runners of an unlicensed money lender, officers from the Criminal Investigation Department sprang into action and swiftly pieced together the clues to bring the perpetrators to justice. A variant of job scams has recently resurfaced where victims were offered lucrative commissions only to be scammed of their own money. Watch the episode for tips on how to safeguard yourself from such scams and protect your personal information.

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore S3
programme.desc: A dramatic day as returning contestants seek to fight their way back into the competition. Then Chef Gaggan makes his comeback with the most emotion-charged cook yet: the home cooks have a video message from their family. The calls trigger tears which turn to terror as the families set a dish to be transformed in Round 1 of cook. In Round 2, another two home cooks will be eliminated in two 30minute heats cooking one of Singapore's favourite crustaceans - either fresh or canned.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: A day in the life of the tropical Pacific. On tiny islands, Komodo dragons fight for leftovers while fiddler crabs joust on the beach. Under the waves, manta rays glide through the deep and bizarre walking sharks patrol the colorful reefs.

programme.desc: The Nile is the world's longest river. From elephants and leopards, to extreme kayakers and ancient wonders, its great length is a lifeline for astonishing wildlife and cultures.

Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets.
